name: AddOrUpdateSquareOnlineSnippet
description:
Add or update a snippet on a Square Online site.

This tool adds a new snippet to or updates an existing snippet on a Square Online site's `head` element. It excludes checkout pages and requires the site's ID. Use ListSites to find site IDs.

parameters.name: site_id_for_snippet
parameters.description: The ID of the site where you want to add or update the snippet. Obtained through ListSites function.

value_schema.description: The ID of the site where you want to add or update the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet_code_content
parameters.description: The code snippet to add or update, which can include valid HTML, JavaScript, or both. This will be appended to the head element of all site pages except checkout pages.

value_schema.description: The snippet code, which can contain valid HTML, JavaScript, or both.

parameters.name: snippet_id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID for the snippet to add or update.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID for the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet_site_id
parameters.description: The ID of the site that contains the snippet to be updated or added.

value_schema.description: The ID of the site that contains the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet_initial_creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the snippet was initially added to the site, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was initially added to the site, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: snippet_last_updated_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp for when the snippet was last updated on the site, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was last updated on the site, in RFC 3339 format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: site_id
parameters.description: The ID of the site where you want to add or update the snippet.

value_schema.description: The ID of the site where you want to add or update the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet.id
parameters.description: The Square-assigned ID for the snippet.

value_schema.description: The Square-assigned ID for the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet.site_id
parameters.description: The ID of the site that contains the snippet.

value_schema.description: The ID of the site that contains the snippet.

parameters.name: snippet.content
parameters.description: The snippet code, which can contain valid HTML, JavaScript, or both.

value_schema.description: The snippet code, which can contain valid HTML, JavaScript, or both.

parameters.name: snippet.created_at
parameters.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was initially added to the site, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was initially added to the site, in RFC 3339 format.

parameters.name: snippet.updated_at
parameters.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was last updated on the site, in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: The timestamp of when the snippet was last updated on the site, in RFC 3339 format.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
